meanings.definition: In a way that relies on each other for support or existence.
meanings.sent1: The two friends worked interdependently to finish their project on time.
meanings.sent2: The plants and animals in the ecosystem rely on each other interdependently.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were interdependently connected, forming a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the clock moved interdependently, ensuring accurate timekeeping.
meanings.sent5: The dancers moved interdependently, creating a mesmerizing performance.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves mutual dependence or reliance.
meanings.sent1: The success of the team members was interdependently linked to each other.
meanings.sent2: The countries in the trade agreement relied on each other interdependently.
meanings.sent3: The siblings' laughter echoed interdependently in the empty house.
meanings.sent4: The wheels of the bicycle turned interdependently, propelling the rider forward.
meanings.sent5: The musicians played interdependently, harmonizing their melodies.
